form.small_heading: Sign up now to join our weekly newsletter!
form.paragraph: Join our weekly newsletter to explore how our Goals shape a fairer, greener and brighter future for everyone. Each issue breaks down complex topics like clean energy access, climate action, and protecting life on land into clear, practical insights you can use in your everyday life. You'll discover inpsiring projects, simple ways to take action, and updates that keep you informed, motivated and connected to a communtiy that cares about the planet.

teamPage.intro: Our group collaborated to design and build this website, with each member contributing to different pages and the final integration of the project.

members.name: Riken Gurung
members.bio: Responsible for creating the main homepage layout and styling.
responsibilities: Applying HTML and CSS for layout and structure
Ensuring the homepage followed accessibility guidelines

members.name: Tomas Wiliams
members.bio: Created the sustainability goals pages, providing layout, content structure and consistent styling.
responsibilities: Structuring content for each sustainability topic
Ensuring all goal pages matched the overall site theme
contributions: Maintained formatting and clarity across pages

members.name: Muhammad Ahmed
members.bio: Worked on the layout and structure of the team information page using HTML and CSS.
responsibilities: Creating the HTML and CSS layout for team information
Ensuring styling matched the rest of the website

members.name: Cameron Witherick
members.bio: Created and styled the newsletter signup form.
responsibilities: Ensuring labels, inputs and formatting followed standards
contributions: Built the full signup form layout
Styled input fields and form presentation
Ensured the form met assignment requirements

members.name: Whole Team
members.bio: Worked collaboratively to combine all pages, test the site and complete documentation.
responsibilities: Ensuring navigation worked across all pages
Completing documentation through Blackboard and Trello
contributions: Integrated all pages into one project
Tested site functionality as a group
